title: Egg hunt from there to here
Cell dipoles feel their way
title_cn: 细胞偶极子感觉自己的方式

title: Self-similarity in ultrafast nonlinear optics
title_cn: 超快速非线性光学中的自相似
abstract: Recent developments in nonlinear optics have led to the discovery of a new class of ultrashort pulse, the ‘optical similariton’. Optical similaritons arise when the interaction of nonlinearity, dispersion and gain in a high-power fibre amplifier causes the shape of an arbitrary input pulse to converge asymptotically to a pulse whose shape is self-similar. In comparison with optical solitons, which rely on a delicate balance of nonlinearity and anomalous dispersion and which can become unstable with increasing intensity, similaritons are more robust at high pulse powers. The simplicity and widespread availability of the components needed to build a self-similar amplifier capable of producing optical similaritons provides a convenient experimental platform to explore the fundamental nature of dynamical self-similarity. Here, we provide an overview of self-similar pulse propagation and scaling in optical fibre amplifiers, and their use in the development of high-power ultrafast optical sources, pulse synthesis and all-optical pulse regeneration.
abstract_cn: 非线性光学的最新发展导致了新型超短脉冲的发现，即“光学相似物”。当高功率光纤放大器中的非线性，色散和增益的相互作用导致任意输入脉冲的形状渐近收敛于形状相似的脉冲时，就会出现光学相似性。与光学孤子相比，光学孤子依赖于非线性和异常色散之间的微妙平衡，并且随着强度的增加而变得不稳定，而在高脉冲功率下，相似子更坚固。构建能够产生光学相似子的自相似放大器所需组件的简单性和广泛可用性为探索动态自相似的基本性质提供了一个方便的实验平台。在这里，我们概述了光纤放大器中自相似脉冲的传播和缩放，以及它们在开发高功率超快光源，脉冲合成和全光脉冲再生中的应用。

title: Inside-out evacuation of transitional protoplanetary discs by the magneto-rotational instability
title_cn: 磁旋转不稳定性使过渡原行星盘从内向外疏散
abstract: A newborn star is encircled by a remnant disc of gas and dust. A fraction of the disc coalesces into planets. Another fraction spirals inward and accretes onto the star. Accreting gas not only produces observed ultraviolet radiation, but also drags along embedded planets, helping to explain otherwise mysterious features of observed extrasolar systems. What drives disc accretion has remained uncertain. The magneto-rotational instability (MRI), driven by coupling between magnetic fields and disc rotation, supplies a powerful means of transport, but protoplanetary disc gas might be too poorly ionized to couple to magnetic fields. Here we show that the MRI explains the observed accretion rates of newly discovered transitional discs, which are swept clean of dust inside rim radii of ∼10 AU. Stellar coronal X-rays ionize the disc rim, activating the MRI there. Gas flows steadily from the rim to the star, at a rate set by the depth to which X-rays ionize the rim wall. Blown out by radiation pressure, dust largely fails to accrete with gas. Our picture supplies one concrete setting for theories of how planets grow and have their orbits shaped by disc gas, and when combined with photo-evaporative disc winds provides a framework for understanding how discs dissipate.
abstract_cn: 一颗新生的恒星被残留的气体和尘埃盘围绕着。椎间盘的一小部分合并成行星。另一部分向内盘旋并在恒星上吸积。积聚的气体不仅会产生观测到的紫外线辐射，而且还会沿着嵌入的行星拖动，从而有助于解释观测到的太阳系外的神秘特征。导致光盘增加的因素仍然不确定。磁旋转不稳定性（MRI）由磁场和磁盘旋转之间的耦合驱动，提供了一种强大的传输手段，但是原行星盘气体可能离子化得很差，无法耦合到磁场。在这里，我们显示出MRI可以解释观察到的新发现的过渡盘的积聚率，这些过渡盘清除了＆＃8764; 10＆＃8201; AU的轮缘半径内的灰尘。恒星冠状X射线使椎间盘边缘电离，从而激活MRI。气体以稳定的速度从轮辋流向恒星，其速率由X射线将轮辋壁离子化的深度确定。尘埃在辐射压力作用下被吹散，在很大程度上不会积聚气体。我们的图片为行星如何生长以及由盘状气体定形的轨道提供了一个具体的背景，并且当与光蒸发的盘状风结合使用时，就为理解盘片的消散提供了框架。

title: Satellite observations of separator-line geometry of three-dimensional magnetic reconnection
title_cn: 三维磁重合分离线几何的卫星观测
abstract: Detection of a separator line that connects magnetic nulls and the determination of the dynamics and plasma environment of such a structure can improve our understanding of the three-dimensional (3D) magnetic reconnection process. However, this type of field and particle configuration has not been directly observed in space plasmas. Here we report the identification of a pair of nulls, the null–null line that connects them, and associated fans and spines in the magnetotail of the Earth using data from the four Cluster spacecraft. With di and de designating the ion and electron inertial lengths, respectively, the separation between the nulls is found to be ∼0.7±0.3di and an associated oscillation is identified as a lower-hybrid wave with wavelength ∼de. This in situ evidence of the full 3D reconnection geometry and associated dynamics provides an important step towards establishing an observational framework of 3D reconnection.
abstract_cn: 连接磁零点的分隔线的检测以及这种结构的动力学和等离子体环境的确定可以改善我们对三维（3D）磁重连接过程的理解。但是，这种类型的场和粒子配置尚未在空间等离子体中直接观察到。在这里，我们使用四个“星团”飞船的数据，报告了对一对零点，连接它们的零点零线以及相关联的扇形和棘形的识别。用d <sub> i </ sub>和d <sub> e </ sub>分别指定离子和电子惯性长度，发现零位之间的间隔为＆＃8764; 0.7＆＃177; 0.3d <sub> i </ sub>和相关的振荡被识别为波长为＆＃8764; d <sub> e </ sub>的下混合波。完整的3D重新连接几何形状和相关动力学的现场证据为建立3D重新连接的观察框架提供了重要的一步。</ p>

title: The energization of relativistic electrons in the outer Van Allen radiation belt
title_cn: Van Allen辐射带外的相对论电子的激发
abstract: The origin and dynamics of the Van Allen radiation belts is one of the longest-standing questions of the space age, and one that is increasingly important for space applications as satellite systems become more sophisticated, smaller and more susceptible to radiation effects. The precise mechanism by which the Earth’s magnetosphere is able to accelerate electrons from thermal to ultrarelativistic energies (E≫0.5 MeV) has been particularly difficult to definitively resolve. The traditional explanation is that large-scale, fluctuating electric and magnetic fields energize particles through radial diffusion. More recent theories and observations have suggested that gyro-resonant wave–particle interactions may be comparable to or more important than radial diffusion. Using data collected simultaneously by multiple satellites passing through the magnetosphere at different distances from the Earth, we demonstrate that the latter of these is the dominant mechanism responsible for relativistic electron acceleration. Specifically, we identify frequent and persistent peaks in equatorial electron phase space density near or inside geosynchronous orbit that provide unambiguous evidence for local wave–particle acceleration. These observations represent an important step towards a more complete physical understanding of radiation belt dynamics and to the development of space-weather models.
abstract_cn: 范艾伦辐射带的起源和动力学是太空时代历史最悠久的问题之一，随着卫星系统变得越来越复杂，体积越来越小并且更容易受到辐射的影响，对于太空应用而言，这一问题变得越来越重要。确切地说，地球磁层能够将电子从热能加速到超相对论能量（E＆＃8811; 0.5＆＃8201; MeV）的精确机制尤其难以确定。传统的解释是，大范围的不断变化的电场和磁场会通过径向扩散来激发粒子。最近的理论和观察表明，陀螺共振波粒子相互作用可能与径向扩散相当或比径向扩散重要。利用多颗同时经过距地球不同距离的磁层的卫星同时收集到的数据，我们证明了后者是导致相对论电子加速的主要机制。具体来说，我们确定了地球同步轨道附近或内部的赤道电子相空间密度的频繁且持续的峰值，这些峰值为局部波的粒子加速度提供了明确的证据。这些观测结果是朝着对辐射带动力学更完整的物理理解和发展空间天气模型迈出的重要一步。

title: Itinerant to localized transition of f electrons in the antiferromagnetic superconductor UPd2Al3
title_cn: 反铁磁超导体UPd2Al3中f电子的局部跃迁
abstract: In heavy-fermion compounds, f electrons show both itinerant and localized behaviour depending on the temperature. Above a characteristic temperature, T*, their magnetic properties can be described by completely ‘localized’ f-electron models. On the other hand, well below T*, their Fermi surfaces can be explained by the ‘itinerant’ f-electron model. These two models assume totally different natures of the f electrons, and how they transform between these states as a function of temperature has never been understood at the level of their electronic structures. Here, we use angle-resolved photoelectron spectroscopy to study the band structure of the heavy-fermion antiferromagnetic superconductor UPd2Al3 below and above T*, and find that the f bands, which form the Fermi surfaces at low temperatures, are excluded from the Fermi surfaces at high temperatures. This result demonstrates how the same f electrons can be both itinerant and localized.
abstract_cn: 在重金属化合物中，f电子根据温度显示巡回和局部行为。在特征温度T * 之上，其磁性能可以完全通过“局部化”来描述。 f电子模型。另一方面，远低于T * 的费米表面可以用＆＃8216; itinerant＆＃8217;解释。 f电子模型。这两个模型假定f电子的性质完全不同，而且在电子状态下，它们如何根据温度在这些状态之间转换是未知的。在这里，我们使用角分辨光电子能谱研究重铁反铁磁超导体UPd 2 Al 3 在T * ，发现在高温下形成费米表面的f带被排除在高温费米表面之外。该结果证明了相同的f电子如何既可以迭代又可以局部化。

title: Observation of Landau levels of Dirac fermions in graphite
title_cn: 观察石墨中狄拉克费米子的朗道水平
abstract: The unique electronic behaviour of monolayer and bilayer graphene is a result of the unusual quantum-relativistic characteristics of the so-called ‘Dirac fermions’ (DFs) that carry charge in these materials. Although DFs in monolayer graphene move as if they were massless, and in bilayer graphene they do so with non-zero mass, all DFs show chirality, which gives rise to an unusual Landau level (LL) energy spectrum and the observation of an anomalous quantum Hall effect in both types of graphene. Here we report low-temperature scanning tunnelling spectra of graphite subjected to a magnetic field of up to 12 T, which provide the first direct observations of the LLs that produce such behaviour. Unexpectedly, we find evidence for the coexistence of both massless and massive DFs in graphite, and confirm the quantum-relativistic nature of these quasiparticles through the appearance of a zero-energy LL.
abstract_cn: 单层和双层石墨烯的独特电子行为是所谓的“狄拉克费米子”的不寻常的量子相对论特征的结果。 （DF）在这些材料中带电荷。 尽管单层石墨烯中的DF似乎无质量运动，而在双层石墨烯中它们以非零质量进行运动，但所有DF都显示出手性，这引起了不寻常的Landau能级（LL）能谱和异常量子的观察 两种石墨烯中的霍尔效应。 在这里，我们报告了受到高达12＆＃8201; T磁场作用的石墨的低温扫描隧道光谱，这提供了对产生这种行为的LL的首次直接观察。 出乎意料的是，我们发现了石墨中无质量DF和质量DF并存的证据，并通过零能量LL的出现证实了这些准粒子的量子相对论性质。

title: Observation of the optical spin Hall effect
title_cn: 观察光学自旋霍尔效应
abstract: The spin Hall effect consists of the generation of a spin current perpendicular to the charge current flow. Thirty-five years after its prediction by Dyakonov and Perel’, it is the focus of experimental and theoretical investigations and constitutes one of the most remarkable effects of spintronics. Owing to scattering and dephasing in electronic gases, it is difficult to observe and has only been demonstrated for the first time a few years ago. Recently, three of us have predicted the optical spin Hall effect, which consists of a separation in real space and momentum space of spin-polarized exciton–polaritons generated by a laser in a semiconductor microcavity. The separation takes place owing to a combination of elastic scattering of exciton–polaritons by structural disorder and an effective magnetic field coming from polarization splitting of the polariton states. The excitonic spin current is controlled by the linear polarization of the laser pump. Here, we report the first experimental evidence for this effect and demonstrate propagation of polariton spin currents over 100 μm in a high-quality GaAs/AlGaAs quantum microcavity. By rotating the polarization plane of the exciting light, we were able to switch the directions of the spin currents.
abstract_cn: 自旋霍尔效应包括垂直于充电电流流动的自旋电流的产生。 Dyakonov和Perel预测其后的35年，它是实验和理论研究的重点，并且构成了自旋电子学最显着的效果之一。由于电子气体中的散射和相移，很难观察到，仅在几年前才被首次证实。最近，我们三个人预测了光学自旋霍尔效应，该效应由半导体微腔中的激光产生的自旋极化激子极化子在实际空间和动量空间中分离。分离是由于由于结构紊乱引起的激子极化子的弹性散射和来自极化子态极化分裂的有效磁场的结合而发生的。激子自旋电流由激光泵浦的线性偏振控制。在这里，我们报告了这种效应的第一个实验证据，并证明了极化子自旋电流在高质量GaAs / AlGaAs量子微腔中的传播超过100微米。通过旋转激发光的偏振面，我们可以切换自旋电流的方向。

title: All-optical injection of ballistic electrical currents in unbiased silicon
title_cn: 在无偏硅中以全光方式注入弹道电流
abstract: Silicon has been the dominant material in electronics since the invention of the integrated transistor. In contrast, silicon’s indirect bandgap and vanishing second-order optical nonlinearity limit its applications in optoelectronics. Although all-optical components such as Raman lasers, parametric amplifiers and electro-optic modulators have recently been reported, control over charge motion in silicon has only ever been achieved electronically. Here, we report all-optical generation of ultrafast ballistic electrical currents in clean, unbiased, bulk silicon at room temperature. This current injection, which provides new insights into optical processes in silicon, results from quantum interference between one- and two-photon absorption pathways across the indirect bandgap despite phonon participation and the multi-valley conduction band. The transient currents induced by 150 fs pulses are detected via the emitted THz radiation. The efficiency of this third-order optical process is surprisingly large for fundamental wavelengths in the 1,420–1,800 nm range.
abstract_cn: 自从集成晶体管问世以来，硅一直是电子领域的主要材料。相反，硅的间接带隙和消失的二阶光学非线性限制了其在光电子学中的应用。尽管最近已经报道了诸如拉曼激光器，参量放大器和电光调制器之类的全光组件，但是对硅中电荷运动的控制只能通过电子方式实现。在这里，我们报道了室温下在干净，无偏的大块硅中全光产生超快弹道电流的过程。尽管有声子参与和多谷导带，但这种电流注入为间接光子带隙之间的单光子吸收路径和双光子吸收路径之间的量子干扰提供了新的见解。通过发射的THz辐射可以检测到由150 fs脉冲感应的瞬态电流。对于1,420＆＃8211; 1,800＆＃8201; nm范围内的基本波长，这种三阶光学过程的效率出奇地高。</ p>

title: Bridging length scales in colloidal liquids and interfaces from near-critical divergence to single particles
title_cn: 胶体液体和界面的桥接长度尺度从近临界散度到单个颗粒
abstract: Boiling and condensation are among the best recognized phase transitions of condensed matter. Approaching the critical point, a liquid becomes indistinguishable from its vapour, the interfacial thickness diverges and the system is dominated by long-wavelength density fluctuations. Long wavelength usually means hundreds of particle diameters, but here we consider the limits of this assumption, using a mesoscopic analogue of simple liquids, a colloid–polymer mixture. We simultaneously visualize both the colloidal particles and near-critical density fluctuations, and reveal particle-level images of the critical clusters and liquid–gas interface. Surprisingly, we find that critical scaling does not break down until the correlation length approaches the size of the constituent particles, where there is a smooth transition to non-critical classical behaviour. Our results could provide a framework for unifying the disparate particle and correlation length scales, and bring new insight into the nature of the liquid–gas interface and the limit of the critical regime.
abstract_cn: 沸腾和冷凝是冷凝物最公认的相变之一。接近临界点时，液体变得无法与蒸气区分开，界面厚度发散，并且该系统以长波密度波动为主导。长波长通常表示数百个粒径，但是在这里，我们使用简单液体的介观类似物，胶体聚合物混合物来考虑此假设的限制。我们同时可视化了胶体粒子和接近临界的密度波动，并揭示了临界团簇和液体和气体界面的粒子级图像。出乎意料的是，我们发现，直到相关长度接近组成粒子的大小时，关键的缩放比例才会分解，在那里，可以平稳地过渡到非关键的经典行为。我们的结果可以为统一不同的粒子尺度和相关长度尺度提供一个框架，并为液体和气体界面的性质以及临界条件的限制带来新的认识。

title: Charge inversion accompanies DNA condensation by multivalent ions
title_cn: 电荷转化伴随多价离子与DNA缩合
abstract: The condensation of stiff, highly charged DNA molecules into compact structures by condensing agents ranging from multivalent ions to small cationic proteins is of major biological and therapeutic importance, yet the underlying microscopic mechanism remains poorly understood. It has been proposed that DNA condensation is a purely electrostatic phenomenon driven by the existence of a strongly correlated liquid (SCL) of counterions at the DNA surface. The same theoretical argument predicts that multivalent counterions overcompensate the DNA charge when present at high concentration, in turn destabilizing the condensates. Here, we demonstrate the occurrence of DNA charge inversion by multivalent ions through measurements of the electrophoretic mobility of condensed DNA. By observing the multivalent-ion-induced condensation of a single DNA molecule using magnetic tweezers, we further show that charge inversion influences condensation by modulating the barrier for condensate nucleation in a manner consistent with the SCL mechanism.
abstract_cn: 通过从多价离子到小的阳离子蛋白的缩合剂将坚硬的，高度带电的DNA分子缩合成紧凑的结构具有重要的生物学和治疗意义，但对潜在的微观机理仍知之甚少。已经提出，DNA缩合是纯净的静电​​现象，这是由于在DNA表面存在抗衡离子的强相关液体（S​​CL）引起的。相同的理论观点预测，当多价抗衡离子以高浓度存在时，会过度补偿DNA电荷，进而使冷凝液不稳定。在这里，我们通过测量浓缩DNA的电泳迁移率证明了多价离子对DNA电荷转化的影响。通过使用磁镊子观察单个DNA分子的多价离子诱导的缩合，我们进一步表明电荷反转通过以与SCL机理一致的方式调节缩合物成核的屏障来影响缩合。

title: Symmetry of large physical systems implies independence of subsystems
title_cn: 大型物理系统的对称性意味着子系统的独立性
abstract: Composite systems consisting of a large number of similar subsystems play an important role in many areas of physics as well as in information theory. Their analysis, however, often relies on the assumption that the subsystems are mutually independent (or only weakly correlated). Here, we show that this assumption is generally justified for quantum systems that are symmetric, that is, invariant under permutations of the subsystems. Because symmetry is often implied by natural properties, for example, the indistinguishability of identical particles, the result has a wide range of consequences. In particular, it implies that global properties of a large composite system can be estimated by measurements applied to a limited number of (randomly chosen) sample subsystems, a fact that is important for the interpretation of experimental data. Moreover, it generalizes statements in quantum information theory and cryptography, which previously have only been known to hold under certain independence assumptions.
abstract_cn: 由大量类似子系统组成的复合系统在物理学的许多领域以及信息论中都起着重要的作用。然而，他们的分析通常依赖于子系统相互独立（或仅弱相关）的假设。在这里，我们证明了这种假设通常对于对称的量子系统是合理的，也就是说，在子系统的排列下不变。由于通常由自然属性（例如，相同粒子的不可区分性）隐含对称性，因此结果具有广泛的后果。特别是，这意味着可以通过对有限数量（随机选择）的样本子系统进行测量来估计大型复合系统的全局属性，这一事实对于解释实验数据非常重要。此外，它概括了量子信息理论和密码学中的陈述，而以前仅在某些独立性假设下才知道这些陈述。

title: Measurement of Rashba and Dresselhaus spin–orbit magnetic fields
title_cn: Rashba和Dresselhaus自旋轨道磁场的测量
abstract: Spin–orbit coupling is a manifestation of special relativity. In the reference frame of a moving electron, electric fields transform into magnetic fields, which interact with the electron spin and lift the degeneracy of spin-up and spin-down states. In solid-state systems, the resulting spin–orbit fields are referred to as Dresselhaus and Rashba fields, depending on whether the electric fields originate from bulk or structure inversion asymmetry, respectively. Yet, it remains a challenge to determine the absolute value of both contributions in a single sample. Here, we show that both fields can be measured by optically monitoring the angular dependence of the electrons’ spin precession on their direction of motion with respect to the crystal lattice. Furthermore, we demonstrate spin resonance induced by the spin–orbit fields. We apply our method to GaAs/InGaAs quantum-well electrons, but it should be universally useful to characterize spin–orbit interactions in semiconductors, and therefore could facilitate the design of spintronic devices.
abstract_cn: 自旋轨道耦合是狭义相对论的一种表现。在移动电子的参考框架中，电场转换为磁场，该磁场与电子自旋相互作用，并提升自旋向上和自旋向下状态的退化。在固态系统中，所产生的自旋轨道场分别被称为Dresselhaus和Rashba场，这取决于电场分别来自于体场还是结构反转不对称。然而，在单个样本中确定两种贡献的绝对值仍然是一个挑战。在这里，我们表明，可以通过光学监控电子的角度依赖性来测量两个场。在相对于晶格的运动方向上旋转进动。此外，我们证明了自旋轨道场引起的自旋共振。我们将我们的方法应用于GaAs / InGaAs量子阱电子，但是它对于表征半导体中的自旋轨道相互作用应该是普遍有用的，因此可以促进自旋电子器件的设计。

title: Dynamics of cell orientation
abstract: Many physiological processes depend on the response of biological cells to mechanical forces generated by the contractile activity of the cell or by external stresses. Using a simple theoretical model that includes the forces due to both the mechanosensitivity of cells and the elasticity of the matrix, we predict the dynamics and orientation of cells in both the absence and presence of applied stresses. The model predicts many features observed in measurements of cellular forces and orientation including the increase with time of the cellular forces in the absence of applied stress and the consequent decrease of the force in the presence of quasi-static stresses. We also explain the puzzling observation of parallel alignment of cells for static and quasi-static stresses and of nearly perpendicular alignment for dynamically varying stresses. In addition, we predict the response of the cellular orientation to a sinusoidally varying applied stress as a function of frequency.
abstract_cn: 许多生理过程取决于生物细胞对由细胞的收缩活动或外部压力产生的机械力的响应。 使用一个简单的理论模型，该模型包括由于细胞的机械敏感性和基质弹性所引起的力，我们可以在不存在和存在施加应力的情况下预测细胞的动力学和方向。 该模型预测了在测量蜂窝力和方向时观察到的许多特征，包括在没有施加应力的情况下蜂窝力随时间的增加以及在存在准静态应力的情况下力的减少。 我们还解释了令人困惑的观察，即静态和准静态应力的单元平行排列以及动态变化的应力的近似垂直排列。 此外，我们预测了细胞取向对正弦变化的外加应力随频率变化的响应。
